meanings.sent1: I will denominate this new species of flower 'Sunshine Bloom'.
meanings.sent2: The scientist decided to denominate the newly discovered element 'Ethernium'.
meanings.sent3: Let's denominate our secret hideout 'Fortress of Fun'!
meanings.sent4: She wanted to denominate her favorite book as 'The Tale of Dreams'.
meanings.sent5: The teacher asked the students to denominate their favorite animals with creative names.

meanings.sent1: The library will denominate all books by genre for easier access.
meanings.sent2: In the competition, each team will denominate a captain to lead them.
meanings.sent3: The chef decided to denominate the dishes on the menu by their main ingredients.
meanings.sent4: The stars above seem to denominate the constellations in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The museum will denominate the artifacts based on their historical significance.

meanings.sent1: Please denominate the exact time you will arrive at the party.
meanings.sent2: The contract will denominate the responsibilities of each party involved.
meanings.sent3: The map will denominate the locations of all the hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: Her expression seemed to denominate her true feelings about the situation.
meanings.sent5: The weather forecast will denominate the chance of rain for the weekend.
